Name: Sacred Valley
About the game: Go on a mission to find the Sacred Valley that's been a urban legend for as long as you remember. Travel through the world, meet new people & complete little quests for the people you meet. Can you reach Sacred Valley's heart? Explore The beauty of Sacred Valley is unforgettable. Every zone is filled with unique design and art. Solve As you progress through the game, you'll find new people with their own problems. Your goal is to help all those people with their quests. Relax The atmosphere of the valley is the calmest thing mankind can think of. Feel natures power while playing the game. Collect Sacred Valley hides a lot of secrets, find new secrets and get achievements for them.
